lst.name: sentence
lst.str: ChemLawn also said it adopted a shareholder rights plan, or "poison pill," during a 120-intermin safeguard period its board adopted to deter attempts to acquire the company through any means other than an all-cash tender offer while it seeks other purchasers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: ChemLawn said its board was determined that Waste's offer was inadequate and not in the best interest of shareholders, and could "adversely affect" the interests of its employees, suppliers, creditors, and customers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: ChemLawn claimed such purchases possibly violated the officers' fiduciary duties and the Securities and Exchange Commission's insider trading rules.
